section.name: What is Close Editor Tabs Left and Right Plugin for Netbeans?
section.p: This is the project page of the NetBeans IDE plugin Close Editor Tabs Left and Right Plugin for Netbeans. This plugin helps you to easily close unused or unwanted editor tabs in the NetBeans IDE. Instead of either close all tabs or all tabs except the currently selected you can also close the tabs right or left from the context menu of a selected tab at once.

ul.li: Close all editor tabs right or left from the context menu of a selected tab at once
The original idea for this plugin and also the first version was developed by Alexander Yastrebov
